definition: only if (..., or otherwise, ...)/only when/only in the case that/unless
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including
abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
If you don't want anyone to know, don't do it (idiom). fig. If you do something bad, people will inevitably hear about it.
pinyin: ruo4 yao4 ren2 bu4 zhi1 , chu2 fei1 ji3 mo4 wei2
containing_words.word: 若要人不知，除非己莫为

sentences.english: The best ideas have to win, otherwise you don’t have good people who stay.
sentences.chinese: 最棒的点子总会胜出，除非你身边的都是些庸才。

sentences.english: But unless you get paid to play videogames, you’re kind of not accomplishing stuff.
sentences.chinese: 但除非你是职业玩家，你什么也没实现。

sentences.english: These increases taper off after a time, though, unless they enter management.
sentences.chinese: 过了一段时间后加薪会逐渐减少，除非进入管理层。

sentences.english: You can’t have good ideas unless you’re willing to generate a lot of bad ones.
sentences.chinese: 除非摒弃诸多不良想法才会有好点子。

sentences.english: No man but a blockhead ever wrote except for money.
sentences.chinese: 除非是傻瓜，从未有人为金钱以外的东西写文章。

sentences.english: No rows are locked unless the data is changing.
sentences.chinese: 不锁住任何行，除非数据发生变化。

sentences.english: Others say only if they cheat, or abuse you.
sentences.chinese: 另外一些人说除非欺骗或者虐待，否则不离开。

sentences.english: A snowslide may make an everlasting love story, but even the snowslide cannot ensure Eternity.
sentences.chinese: 除非有雪崩，但雪崩也不能保证永恒。

sentences.english: Unless you want to start a forest fire, you better put out that fire.
sentences.chinese: 除非你想发动一场林火，你最好把那火灭了。

sentences.english: Unless you're privy to divine inspiration, the best thing to do is to watch the process evolve.
sentences.chinese: 除非你知道秘密内情，最好的办法就是静观其变。

sentences.english: Unless, of course, I change my relationship to the device.
sentences.chinese: 除非，当然，我改变了我与设备之间的联系。

sentences.english: There should be no sub-contracting unless previously agreed with the main client.
sentences.chinese: 不该该有任何分包，除非以前与首要客户赞成。

sentences.english: Unless you are a native Indian, everyone emigrated from somewhere.
sentences.chinese: 除非你是印度土著，不然人都是各处移民的。

sentences.english: Unless you are getting some popcorn or something else that can be microwaved.
sentences.chinese: 除非你想要爆米花或是其他已经做好的东西。

sentences.english: SAYID: No, you'd rather be out here alone and get lost or hurt.
sentences.chinese: 不，除非你宁愿一个人呆在这儿，迷路和受到伤害。

sentences.english: You and your friend are off the job until further notice.
sentences.chinese: 你和你的朋友被停职了，除非另行通知。

definition: in case (sth happens)/if/once (sth happens, then...)/when/in a short time/in one day
